howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Your journey to homeownership in 6 simple steps

1.title: Get Pre-Approved
1.description: Start by getting pre-approved for financing. Understand your budget and show sellers you're serious.

2.title: Choose Your Community
2.description: Select between LaBelle or Lehigh Acres. Each community offers unique benefits and amenities.

3.title: Select Your Model
3.description: Choose from our available models: Louisiana, Viana, Delanie, Aurora, Langdon, or Emelia.

4.title: Choose Financing
4.description: Explore our financing options including traditional mortgages and our Rent to Own program with $0 down.

5.title: Build Your Home
5.description: Watch your dream home come to life with quality construction and attention to detail.

6.title: Move In
6.description: Receive the keys to your new home and start creating lasting memories with your family.

testimonials.title: What Our Families Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from real families who found their dream home with us

1.name: Sarah & Michael Johnson
1.text: M.J. Newell Homes made our dream come true. The Rent to Own program allowed us to move into our beautiful home with $0 down. The quality is exceptional and the process was smooth from start to finish.

2.name: Roberto & Maria Garcia
2.text: We couldn't be happier with our new home! The 1/4 acre lot gives our kids plenty of space to play, and no HOA fees means we save money every month. Highly recommend M.J. Newell Homes!

3.name: David & Jennifer Smith
3.text: The team at M.J. Newell Homes was professional, responsive, and truly cared about our family's needs. Our new home exceeded all expectations. Thank you for making homeownership possible for us!

4.name: Carlos & Ana Rodriguez
4.text: Amazing experience from day one! The build quality is outstanding and the customer service is top-notch. We love our new home and the community. M.J. Newell Homes truly delivers on their promises.

5.name: James & Lisa Thompson
5.text: Best decision we ever made! The Rent to Own program was perfect for our situation. The home is beautiful, spacious, and exactly what we needed. Thank you M.J. Newell Homes for making our dream a reality!

6.name: Miguel & Carmen Martinez
6.text: We are so grateful to M.J. Newell Homes. The entire process was transparent and stress-free. Our new home is perfect for our growing family. The quality and attention to detail exceeded our expectations!
